data.title: Lakshmi and Madhoo Unite for Bejoy Nambiar’s new series 'Sweet Kaaram Coffee'
data.meta_description: The web series is all set to stream on Amazon Prime Video
data.text:
Amazon Prime Video recently released the first look poster of their new web series Sweet Kaaram Coffee. The series sees women of three generations of a family setting aside the expectations on them and going on a journey of self-discovery. Veteran actors Lakshmi and Madhoo headline the series along with Santhy Balakrishnan. The series also features Kavin Jay Babu, Vamsi Krishna, Samyuktha Vishwanathan, Bala Suresh and Ganesh Venkatraman.

Sweet Kaaram Coffee is directed by Bejoy Nambiar, Swathi Raghuraman and Krishna Marimuthu and is produced by Reshma Ghatala, who is known for her collaborations with Gautam Vasudev Menon on Neethane En Ponvasantham, Enai Noki Paayum Thota and Ram’s Thanga Meengal. Govind Vasantha provides music for the entire series. The series will premiere on July 6 and will be available in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam and Hindi.
